english_example_sentence: If you hadn't lost your hope, you would have found a solution.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не потерял свою надежду, ты бы нашел решение.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen hiç umudunu kaybetmemişsen, bir çıkış yolu bulurdun.
